title: health endpoint returns service status
description: Verify that the /health GET endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON body containing the service status, service name, and version.

title: metrics endpoint returns cache_performance_metrics
description: Verify that the /metrics GET endpoint returns cache performance metrics for the authenticated tenant, including requests, hits, semantic hits, misses, hit ratio, similarity threshold, entries, and latency percentiles.

title: simple_query_endpoint_returns_cached_or_fresh_answer
description: Verify that the /query GET endpoint returns a cached answer if available (exact or semantic hit) or a fresh answer if a cache miss occurs, including meta information about hit type, similarity, latency, and strategy.

title: chat_completions_endpoint_returns_cached_or_fresh_response
description: Verify that the /v1/chat/completions POST endpoint returns a cached chat completion response if available (exact or semantic hit) or queries the upstream LLM and caches the response on a miss, including meta information about cache hit status.
